_comment: This is the default English translation file. It will be populated with keys as components are localized.

description.part2: is the first self-sustaining Proof-of-Work token on Sonic built to hold and grow value—forever.
description.part3: It fuses Bitcoin-style mining with a powerful economic engine driven by Sonic's native FeeM mechanism.
description.part4: Built around the number 8—a symbol of infinite potential—Infinity embraces the technical innovation made possible only on Sonic to introduce a new kind of store of value.

howItWorks.title: >HOW IT WORKS?
howItWorks.subtitle: Every time someone mines INFINITY on Sonic, they pay a small gas fee. 90% of it flows into the FeeM treasury and is instantly reinvested back into the ecosystem through:
howItWorks.item2: Voters Incentives to the Shadow pool to deepen liquidity

how.title: >HOW IT WORKS?
how.subtitle: Infinity powers a flywheel between mining and value:
how.point1: Miners use our open-source CLI Miner to earn $8 while burning gas with every successful transaction—generating clean, custom wallet addresses along the way.
how.point2: 90% of the gas fees go straight back into the ecosystem through automatic buybacks and bribes.
how.point3: As price and liquidity grow, mining becomes even more attractive.
how.conclusion: The more the community mines, the stronger the token gets—fueling a self-sustaining loop of demand and value.

primary.title: INFINITY
primary.subtitle: The first truly self-sustaining pow cryptocurrency
